title: You can be smoking with cash at the National
author: Yankeefan51

posts.post_title: You can be smoking with cash at the National
posts.post_content:
Up to $250 reward paid for any transaction we make- must not be on E Bay or in auction. Thanks.


We are aggressively seeking high grade examples of the cards. Pins and postcards listed below. Top dollar paid. Trades Considered. Confidentiality assured.
Please write in confidence, with scan to [url]bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com[/url]
